abstract: Teenage boy holds 29 high school students and teacher at gunpoint at Philip Barbour High School, Philippi, W Va, before surrendering to police; no injuries reported.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor said she would pursue charges against a 14-year-old boy who was apprehended in what the authorities say was a hostage-taking on Tuesday at a high school in Philippi.

headline.main: West Virginia: Boy, 14, Is Arrested After High School Hostage-Taking
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Boy, 14, Is Arrested After High School Hostage-Taking

snippet: A prosecutor said she would pursue charges against a 14-year-old boy who was apprehended in what the authorities say was a hostage-taking on Tuesday at a high school in Philippi.
